Key Match Events: Kagiso Rabada picked up crucial wickets in his spell of 3-18 and restricted the run rate as the US fell short.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Jones said, 'It's hard to take the defeat after getting so close. We could have been a little more disciplined bowling-wise.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa scored freely at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium, posting 4-194 on the back of Quinton de Kock's fine knock of 74.
US opener Andries Gous (80 not out) provided the fireworks along with Harmeet Singh (38) down the order.

Despite Netravalkar's superb spell (2-21), the others failed to contain South Africa as Heinrich Klaasen dealt in sixes and scored a quick-fire 36 in an unbroken 53-run partnership with Tristan Stubbs (20) to propel them to 4-194.
